config.timestamp.column.name: MODIFIED_DATE
config.query: SELECT eso.WFE_TRANS_ID AS ORDER_NUMBER, esod.STATUS, esod.EXT_REF_ID, esod.MODIFIED_DATE FROM EDOM.E_SALES_ORDER_DETAILS esod INNER JOIN (SELECT SALES_ORDER_ID, WFE_TRANS_ID FROM EDOM.E_SALES_ORDERS) eso ON eso.SALES_ORDER_ID = esod.SALES_ORDER_ID WHERE MODIFIED_DATE >= sysdate - interval '300' minute
